channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023110947
item.description:
Report X-2023110947

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was seen on the IC belt with a wet spot and hole near the top corner. It was taken off and inspected in the Damages Area to determine if something else had leaked on the box. It was then put into a HazMat tote and HazMat bag after the leak was found. DescribePack: One plastic jug had its cap loose within the box. The seal under the cap was coming off. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was moved into the HazMat tote and HazMat bag before being placed inside the HazMat Cage.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box found during unload of trailer from preload. Box was placed in plastic bag and taken to damage cage. DescribePack: Small hole in cap. The inner seal of cap was missing. Causing liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection box and contents were placed in a hazmat bag and salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023110978
item.description:
Report X-2023110978

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package arrived already wet to the station and it was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: All 4 plastic bottles leaked from loose caps. The 2 bottles of Rapicide Part A are hazardous but not the Part B. The caps were not secured. No padding was used. Only slotted partitions were used as inner packaging materials. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment upon arrival. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023110970
item.description:
Report X-2023110970

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection it was found that a 4.5 gallon pail of Hydrogen Peroxide, aqueous solution had a loose closure which caused leakage. DescribePack: a 4.5 gallon pail of Hydrogen Peroxide, aqueous solution had a loose closure which caused leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in a hazmat lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023110755
item.description:
Report X-2023110755

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-03
  • City: FORT MYERS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading the cardboard was noticed to be "soft" no visible wet spots. Further inspection was needed. DescribePack: 2 of 4 bottles of reagent alcohol had lids that were barely on the bottles. There is a measure in place on the lids that indicate if the bottles were opened. this was still in place as upon inspection when turning the lids can hear the tab "break" indicating that it was previously unopened. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: lids tightened and ensured the bottles in a bin were upright

item.description:
Report X-2023110629

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: HOMESTEAD
  • State: FL

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO QA, UPON INSPECTION CONTENT PUNCTURED . NOT ENOUGH PACKING MATERIAL USED. A LOT OF NEGATIVE SPACE ALLOWING CONTENT TO SHIFT ON IMPACT. CONTENT NOT SECURED AND NOT PACKED WELL ENOUGH TO PREVENT MOVEMENT UPON IMPACT. DescribePack: METAL PUNCTURED DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PUT INSIDE HAZMAT TOTE AND STORED IN HAZMAT CAGE

DescribePack: All 4 plastic bottles of Sunnyside Muriatic Acid leaked from loose caps while in transit. No inner packaging materials were used. Caps were not secured DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the wet package was placed in a hazmat bag for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023110611
item.description:
Report X-2023110611

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023110611-SequenceEvent: Box arrived leaking badly. Box was placed inside of hazmat bag and tote and brought to the hazmat cage to be processed. DescribePack: 1 gallon jug was found with a loose cap and spilled entire gallon into box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box was placed inside of hazmat bag and tote and brought to hazmat cage to be processed. X-2023110612-SequenceEvent: Package pulled off of conveyer belt due to it leaking. events before unknown. box ripped and wet due to leakage. Package put in Hazmat bin with plastic bag and brought to damage hazmat cage for processing. DescribePack: side of box at seems ripped due to being wet. whole side of box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package immediately put into a damaged hazmat plastic bag and bin and brought to damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023101441
item.description:
Report X-2023101441

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-24
  • City: GAINESVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023101441 AT THE GAINESVILLE FLORIDA UPS CUSTOMER COUNTER FACILITY, A CUSTOMER DROPPED OFF AN AIR PACKAGE DESTINED TO SPAIN. THE THERMAL TRACKING LABEL AND INVOICE DESCRIBE CONTENTS AS SODIUM POLYACRYLATE (25G). UPON INSPECTION OF PACKAGE CONTENTS THERE IS ONE BOTTLE OF 3-METHYLINDOLE (SKATOLE), >99% ACS GRADE, CAS: 83-34-1. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 3V5R01, YANNI MORAITES, 2838 NW 41ST AVE., GAINESVILLE FL 32605. X-2023101442-AT THE GAINESVILLE FLORIDA UPS CUSTOMER COUNTER FACILITY, A CUSTOMER DROPPED OFF A THREE DAY SELECT AIR PACKAGE DESTINED FOR NH, USA. UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS CHEMICALS. ONE BOTTLE IS IODOMETHANE, CAS: 74-88-4 REGULATED AS UN2644, METHYL IODIDE, 6.1, PG I. ONE BOTTLE IS BROMOETHANE, CAS: 74-96-4 REGULATED AS UN1891, ETHYL BROMIDE, 3 (6.1),II. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 3V5R01, YANNI MORAITES, 2838 NW 41ST AVE., GAINESVILLE FL 32605.

  • City: ORLANDO
